description: This is the main application class for the Notes Backend project, setting up the Spring Boot application, configuring API documentation with Swagger, and logging startup messages.

classes.name: NotesBackendApplication
classes.description: Main Spring Boot application class that bootstraps the backend, sets up API documentation, and provides startup logging.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, starts Spring Boot and logs startup message.

methods.name: startupLog
methods.description: Bean that runs after startup, logs application initialization and Swagger UI URL.

calls: log.info("Notes Manager backend started on port 3001")
log.info("Application initialized. Swagger UI available at /swagger-ui.html")
